headline: Genpact Named a Leader in Everest Group's Banking Operations PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025
summary: Genpact (NYSE: G), an advanced technology services and solutions company, today announced it has been named a Leader in the Everest Group Banking Operations – Services PEAK Matrix® Assessment 2025. The recognition highlights Genpact's ability to deliver end-to-end banking operations by combining deep domain expertise, AI-first digital platforms, and proven operational excellence. Download and read the full report here.
